page.title: 17LEISURE
page.content: In Rookhope there is a park. It is not a very big one. It has swings, a slide and a rocking horse. In summer we go to a place called Risby where you can swim. It is about three miles from Rookhope. Sometimes , if you do not want to go swimming, you can sit on the grass and watch. If you want to go to the swimming baths, the nearest one to Rookhope is at Stanhope. Every June we have a Carnival and we all get dressed up. Some people go on floats while others walk. On Christmas Eve Santa comes to the village in a horse box to give presents to the children.
